projects.title: Food Truck Trackers — iOS Application
projects.description: Designed and built an iOS application for business owners and customers to improve communication, service updates, and smoother business operations.

projects.title: Automatic Database Schema Generation Using GUI
projects.description: Built a system that allows developers to create database schema through a GUI so they can focus on design rather than manual scripting. Implemented with a 3-tier architecture and Oracle backend.

projects.title: Corruption Control through Budget Maintenance
projects.description: Built a web application to track government fund release and utilization, improving transparency by showing how funds were used and by whom.

projects.title: Law and Order Automation
projects.description: Web application for next-generation police reporting and intelligence workflows to reduce manual effort, improve incident processing, and help agencies allocate resources effectively.
